DOC.brief_title: Study Amnion-derived Cellular Cytokine Solution ( ACCS ) Versus Saline Treating Skin Irritation From Radiation
DOC.criteria: A signed IRB approve Informed Consent ; Women 18 80 year age ; Biopsyproven diagnosis breast cancer tumor surgically remove . Whole breast radiation without ipsilateral axilla radiation therapy recommend radiation oncologist . If woman childbearing potential , partner must use effective form birth control . Willing participate clinical study comply requirement trial . Abnormal liver kidney function study great 2x upper limit normal . Patients hemodialysis Psychiatric condition substance abuse Investigator 's opinion may pose threat patient compliance ; History noncompliance treatment clinical visit attendance .
